attributes.action: uphold the current Green Belt around the city of Nottingham and not allow the potential expansion of the city, leading to the destruction of valuable local enviroments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been suggested that the current Green Belt around Nottingham be relaxed, with the areas of countryside to the North, East & South of Nottingham opened to intensive development. It is felt, by many local residents, that the potential expansion of the city will have a huge impact on the local enviroment and be to the detriment of local residents. Please support this petition.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "uphold the current Green Belt around the city of Nottingham and not allow the potential expansion of the city, leading to the destruction of valuable local enviroments."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16889


Prime Minister's Office
